text.text:
Successful Restaurant Relocation at ION Orchard!

Move Move Movers just completed a major commercial move for a restaurant at ION Orchard! From heavy kitchen equipment to delicate furnishings, our team handled everything with precision, care, and efficiency.

Whether it’s a residential or commercial move, you can count on us for reliable and professional service.

Need moving help? Move with Move Move Movers – we’ve got you covered!

Contact us today or check out our reviews to see why customers trust us!

text.text: I had high tea at the Atico, a bar located on level 55 of the building. Nice view of the night sky and MBS when it's all lit up. The music was a tad bit too loud and good to tone down on the service too. A nice place to chill otherwise.

originalText.text: I had high tea at the Atico, a bar located on level 55 of the building. Nice view of the night sky and MBS when it's all lit up. The music was a tad bit too loud and good to tone down on the service too. A nice place to chill otherwise.

text.text:
ION Orchard is a premier shopping destination in Singapore, boasting over 300 stores across eight floors. This luxurious mall offers a mix of high-end and everyday brands, making it a top spot for retail therapy.

Discover iconic designer brands like Louis Vuitton, Gucci, Prada, and Chanel
Enjoy upscale culinary experiences at restaurants like Imperial Treasure Fine Teochew Cuisine and Taste Paradise
TWG Tea Salon & Boutique, Hoshino Coffee, and The Marmalade Pantry.
There is a large food court to savour local and international flavours at Food Opera,  featuring losts of food stalls

ION Sky Observation Deck gives  panoramic views of the city from the 56th floor.
It is a great place to get your purchases beautifully wrapped gifts.
the mall

ION Orchard is a must-visit destination for anyone looking for a luxurious shopping experience in Singapore.

text.text:
This is my favourite shopping mall in Singapore.
The food opera is a really good food court, with lots of reasonably priced options.
It's got most of the shops you actually buy from, like Uniqlo etc.
There's a MRT station there giving you great access to anywhere you want to go to.

originalText.text:

text.text: A nice huge mall with many shops and an adjacent underground station.  I came there at the end of Jan. 2025 to watch the traditional New Year's Lion dance which was great.  Many people are coming to this show, and you must arrive well in advance to get a good viewing spot.
